properties.name: Blocks
properties.description: Build your popup with the blocks you need.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Enter the title

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Choose the title font color

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the title font size in pixels.

properties.name: Font Weight
properties.description: Select bold or regular font.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Enter the text.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Choose the text font color.

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the text font size in pixels.

properties.name: Banner Image
properties.description: Upload banner image.

properties.name: Position
properties.description: Select the banner position as related to the rest of the popup content. You can choose top, right, left or bottom.

properties.name: Image
properties.description: Upload your image.

properties.name: Scale, %
properties.description: Adjust image size.

properties.name: YouTube / Vimeo URL
properties.description: Paste your video's YouTube or Vimeo URL.

properties.name: Autoplay
properties.description: Set autoplay option to ON to have the video play automatically once the popup is open.

properties.name: Coupon Code
properties.description: Enter the discount coupon code.

properties.name: "Click to Copy" text
properties.description: Enter or edit your custom Click to Copy message.

properties.name: "COPIED" text
properties.description: Enter or edit your custom COPIED message.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Set the coupon block color.

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the font size in pixels.

properties.name: Click Action
properties.description: Select an action performed by clicking the button. You can either redirect the user to a specific URL or close the popup.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: Set the URL to redirect the users to.

properties.name: Button Text
properties.description: Enter button text.

properties.name: Style
properties.description: Choose your button's style - Filled or Outline.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Set the button color.

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the button font size in pixels.

properties.name: Click Action
properties.description: Select an action performed by clicking the link. You can either redirect the user to a specific URL or close the popup.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: Set the URL to redirect the users to.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: Enter the link text.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Set the link color.

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the font size in pixels.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Set the separator color.

properties.name: Margin (px)
properties.description: Set the margin for the separator. This will define the spacing between the separator and previous/next block.

properties.name: Size (px)
properties.description: Set spacing in pixels.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: Set the iframe URL.

properties.name: Width (px, %)
properties.description: Set the iframe width in pixels or percents. Set 100% to make it take up the entire width of the popup.

properties.name: Height (px, auto)
properties.description: Set the iframe height in pixels.

properties.name: HTML Code
properties.description: Enter your custom HTML code.

properties.name: Fields
properties.description: Use fields to build your form.

properties.name: Label
properties.description: Enter the label text.

properties.name: Button Text
properties.description: Enter the form submit button text.

properties.name: Action After Submit
properties.description: Select an action performed after the form is submitted. You can either redirect the user to a specific URL or close the popup.

properties.name: URL
properties.description: Set the URL to redirect the users to.

properties.name: Button Style
properties.description: Choose your button's style - Filled or Outline.

properties.name: Font Size (px)
properties.description: Set the font size in pixels. This will be applied both to the fields and the submit button.

properties.name: Button Color
properties.description: Set submit button color.

properties.name: Fields Color
properties.description: Set the fields color.

properties.name: Layout
properties.description: Select the popup layout.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Set the popup width in pixels.

properties.name: Blocks Alignment
properties.description: Align the popup blocks on left, right or in the center.

properties.name: Popup Corners
properties.description: Select popup corners type - Square or Rounded.

properties.name: Background Color
properties.description: Set the popup background color.

properties.name: Background Image
properties.description: Upload a background image for your popup.

properties.name: Background Image Overlay Color
properties.description: Set the background image overlay color.

properties.name: Display Overlay
properties.description: Activate/Deactivate popup overlay.

properties.name: Close popup on overlay click
properties.description: Set this option to ON to close the popup on overlay click.

properties.name: Background Color
properties.description: Set the overlay color.

properties.name: Background Image
properties.description: Upload the overlay image.

properties.name: Background Image Overlay Color
properties.description: Set the image overlay color.

properties.name: Display Close Button
properties.description: Set this option to ON to show a close button on your popup.

properties.name: Color
properties.description: Set the close button color.

staticHtml.content: Set triggers to open your popup.

properties.name: On Page Load
properties.description: Open popup once the page is loaded.

properties.name: Time on Page
properties.description: Open popup after a user spends a specific amount of time (in seconds) on the page.

properties.name: Time on Page Duration (seconds)
properties.description: Set the time interval in seconds to open popup.

properties.name: On Scroll
properties.description: Open popup after a user has scrolled over a specific percentage of the page.

properties.name: Scroll Position (%)
properties.description: Set the percentage.

properties.name: On Scroll to Element
properties.description: Open popup after a user has scrolled over a specific element on your page.

properties.name: HTML Element ID
properties.description: Enter the element's id.

properties.name: On Click
properties.description: Open popup when a user clicks on the specific element on your page.

properties.name: HTML Element ID
properties.description: Enter the element's id.

properties.name: On Exit Intent
properties.description: Open popup when a user intends to close the page.

properties.name: Frequency
properties.description: Choose display frequency for your popup.

options.name: Show every time, until I close it

properties.name: Select pages to display
properties.caption: Set the pages on which your popup will be displayed.
properties.description: Set the pages on which your popup will be displayed.

properties.name: Don't display widget on these pages
URL
properties.description: Set the URL of the page where you don't want to display the widget.
List the pages where you don't want to display the widget.

properties.name: Display widget only on these pages
URL
properties.description: Set the URl of the page with the widget.
List all the pages that will display the widget.

properties.name: Show on Devices
properties.description: Choose the type of device to display your popup on.
